Posts.Content: nybc2013 wrote: Has anyone had a quadrantectomy without RT for IDC?  It is an easier surgical choice...my IDC is 4mm and it is this or a Unilateral with reconstruction.   Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2013 05:23PM nybc2013 wrote: HI the difference is that in a lumpectomy they take the tumor and margins but in the quadrantectomy they take all the tissue from the quadrant where the tumor was located
